import {Meta} from '@storybook/addon-docs/blocks';

<Meta title="Templates/Components/ViewTabSearchTemplate"/>

# Default View Search Template Factory

```jsx

const ComposedQuickSearch = R.compose(withQuickSearchCriteria, withQuickSearchFields)(QuickSearch);

const DefaultViewTabSearchTemplateFactory = props => {
	const {Component = SearchTemplate, ...otherProps} = props;

	const ComposedSearchTemplate = R.compose(withSearchTemplateFormState)(Component);

	return (
		<ComposedSearchTemplate {...otherProps} disablePin disableRecentHistory QuickSearchComponent={ComposedQuickSearch}/>
	);
};
```
